wikipedia_page.main: Prof Morrison Watson FRS FRSE FRCPE (1845–1885) was a 19th-century Scottish anatomist and comparative anatomist.

response: In 1883 he was elected a Fellow of the Royal Society of Edinburgh. His proposers were Sir John Murray, Morrison Watson, John Gray McKendrick and James Cossar Ewart.

Turner was appointed Professor of Anatomy at the University of Edinburgh in 1867. Only at this point (despite being married) did he leave his rooms at Old College and move to a house. This was at 7 Brunswick Street north of Calton Hill.Edinburgh Post Office Directory 1868 His assistant at this point was Morrison Watson who acted as his Demonstrator.
